How many major types of stress that can affect the structure of an aircraft:
Tension stress is?
Answers: That resists the forces which pull it apart.
That resists the forces which compress it apart.
That resists the forces which torsion it apart.

Questions.QuestionString: Compression stress is?
Answers: That resists the forces which pull it apart.
That resists the forces which torsion it apart.

Questions.QuestionString: Torsion stress is?
Answers: That resists the forces which pull it apart.
That resists the forces which compress it apart.

Questions.QuestionString: Shear stress is?
Answers: That resists the forces which pull it apart.
Resists a force which causes a layer of material to slide over an adjacent layer of material.
That resists the forces which torsion it apart.

Questions.QuestionString: Bending stress is?
Answers: That resists the forces which pull it apart.
That resists the forces which torsion it apart.
